mapper.insert: insert into media (title, description, company, genre, movie, opening_year, age_limit, media, bg_img, poster_img) values (#{title},#{description},#{company},#{genre},#{movie},#{openingYear},#{ageLimit},#{media},#{bgImg},#{posterImg})
mapper.select: select mno, poster_img from media where movie = false
select count(mno) from media where genre=#{genre} and movie = true
mapper.insert: insert into season (title, season, media, thumbnail, description, mno) values (#{title}, #{season}, #{media}, #{thumbnail}, #{description}, #{mno})
mapper.select: select * from season where mno = #{mno} and season = #{season}
select media from season where sno=#{sno}
